column4: anyone to tell me how to change that annoying black background color in synpatic that didn't changed after 11.10 update , same for nautilus
i reinstalled all light themes with original ones , supressed all themes in ./themes , now i don't see what i can do i even erased what was in .gtk*
if it's just an issue with your login account, you could create a new user, move your files (but not settings) to the new account.  good luck.
